TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_u_cudad_nu_mapalaway_a_dabak(20181018)：u_kawaw_nu_Palamal, title = u_cudad_nu_mapalaway_a_dabak(20181018)：u_kawaw_nu_Palamal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_cudad_nu_mapalaway_a_dabak(20181018)：u_kawaw_nu_Palamal} }

S.FORM: u cudad nu mapalaway a dabak(2018.10.18):u kawaw nu Palamal lacul sakacacay a ngatu: 1. cima ku mikelid tu lisin nu Palamal ? 2. u canan ku kaukak, laylay atu zateng?結構,程序,邏輯 3. u canan ku adingu靈,tademaw人, liwliw場,zazan道,sakaluk法? 4. cima ku mipuhpuhay nu mapalaway? di'tu asaca tademawa? 6. i panamuh tu di'tu a lawad sa, mipasei caykaw u mibahbah? 7. haymaw han溫柔,teketekeda han個別,azihen tu mata接眼,pitengilen傾聽,papuhpuhen施法,samisaydan saan把自己當醫生,amana pulung muculil不需要集體行動 8. pawawada' a zateng 分組概念 9. putiput a zateng 團隊概念 10. pilucek tu pasayzaan 11. miasik tu liwliw, kya pasayzaan atu silsil

o codad no mapalaway a dabak(2018.10.18):o kawaw no Palamal lacol sakacacay a ngato: 1. cima ko mikelid to lisin no Palamal ? 2. o canan ko kaokak, laylay ato zateng?結構,程序,邏輯 3. o canan ko adingo靈,tademaw人, liwliw場,zazan道,sakalok法? 4. cima ko mipohpohay no mapalaway? di'to asaca tademawa? 6. i panamoh to di'to a lawad sa, mipasei caykaw o mibahbah? 7. haymaw han溫柔,teketekeda han個別,azihen to mata接眼,pitengilen傾聽,papohpohen施法,samisaydan saan把自己當醫生,amana polong mocolil不需要集體行動 8. pawawada' a zateng 分組概念 9. potipot a zateng 團隊概念 10. pilocek to pasayzaan 11. miasik to liwliw, kya pasayzaan ato silsil
